data.name: Although_Not_Mandatory
data.value: Although not mandatory, a series of allowable general and route-specific models and approaches for industry placements can be adopted to make sure that placements are accessible and meaningful for all students. The route-specific models and approaches are tailored to the requirements of specialist industries so that placements are deliverable across all T Level provision.

data.name: For_The_First_Two_Waves_Of_Tlevel_Students
data.value: For the first two waves of T Level students, starting in 2020 to 2021 and 2021 to 2022, we have specified some temporary flexibilities that can be applied by exception and as a last resort.

data.name: Learners_May_Experience_Difficult_Circumstances_During_Their_Placement
data.value: Learners may experience difficult circumstances during their placement, which means they are unable to complete the minimum placement hours before the end of the second year.

data.name: Manage_Tlevel_Results_Is_The_Service_That_Exam_Boards
data.value: Manage T Level results is the service that exam boards and education providers use to provide DfE with the data needed to calculate overall T Level grades and issue certificates.

data.name: Temporary_Flexibilities_Will_Be_Withdrawn
data.value: Temporary flexibilities will be withdrawn in July 2023.

data.value: The results are provided in csv format.

data.value: T Level results for learners starting their T Levels in 2020 to 2021 is published in line with A level results.

data.name: We_Understand_That_Covid_May_Have_Made_It_Particulary_Hard_To_Deliver_Placements
data.value: We understand that Covid-19 may have made it particularly hard to deliver placements against the core principles set out in the industry placement delivery guidance.

data.name: We_Will_Ask_You_For_The_Total_Number_Of_Hours_Completed
data.value: We will ask you for the total number of hours completed and the reason for granting special consideration. You should hold supporting documentation in your own files.

data.name: We_Will_Ask_You_To_Specify_For_Each_Learner
data.value: We will ask you to specify for each learner whether any temporary flexibilities were used.

data.name: We_Will_Ask_You_To_Specify_For_Each_Learner_Wheather_One_Or_More_Industry_Placement_Models_Were_Used
data.value: We will ask you to specify for each learner whether one or more of these industry placement models were used.

data.name: Who_Is_Entitled_To_A_Statemnet_Of_Achievement
data.value: Who is entitled to a statement of achievement?

data.name: You_Can_Add_Learner_Information_Manually
data.value: You can add learner information manually, which means that you input all of the required data from your own records.

data.name: You_Can_Read_More_About_Industry_Placement_Models_In_Annex_A
data.value: You can read more about industry placement models in 'Annex A: Different models and approaches to delivery' (PDF), available to download from the

data.name: You_Can_Read_More_About_Temporary_Flexibilities
data.value: You can read more about temporary flexibilities in 'Temporary flexibilities for 2020 and 2021 students' (PDF), available to download from the

data.name: You_Have_The_Discretion_To_Apply_Special_Consideration
data.value: You have the discretion to apply special consideration in some exceptional circumstances where students have demonstrated sufficient progress towards their learning goals but have not completed the minimum placement hours.
